entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
